page.title: 03Shopping in Clapham
page.content: If you wanted groceries you could go to a certain number of places in Clapham like Freezewell or the place near Jack Foster's. Freezewell is very near to the school. In fact, it's right opposite to it and it has two exits, a back one and a front one, but the front one is the most popular. Inside it is very spacious except for one long freezer and 36 other freezers. It is open from Monday to Wednesday from 9.OO a.m. to 5.3O p.m. Thursday is 9.OO a.m. to 6.OO p.m. Friday is 9.OO a.m. to 8.OO p.m. Saturday is 9.OO a.m. to 6.OO p.m. and Sunday is 1O.3O a.m. to 4.3O p.m. It sells quite a lot of things including frozen foods, cereals, ice cream, vegetables, spirits, sweets, meat and fish.
